text: Israelia fomɨra men avɨribav soghezɨ me ariaghire, egha bar me kuavaremezir puvatɨzɨ, men ovavir borir vabara ikiavɨra iti. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Solomon me gamizɨma, me puram an ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar mɨn otivigha, datɨrɨghɨn ikia kamaghɨra iti.9:21 Mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir kam, “datɨrɨghɨn uaghan,” an en itir dughiar kam mɨgeir puvatɨ. A gumazir akɨnafarir kam osirizimɨn dughiam mɨgei.
